channel.title: Dialogues
channel.description: When i add dialogue to a npc i have to compile right?

item.title: Dialogues
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:8, topic:162011”][quote author=Budda link=topic=220394.msg1911314#msg1911314 date=1196659778]

[quote author=[-J O H N-] link=topic=220394.msg1909381#msg1909381 date=1196581030]
Obviously. Compiling a java file creates class files, your server runs on class files. (Most do)

do you have a good compiler?
[/quote]

Hmmm, try the compiler included with JDK? Its called something like…javac.exe I think. Not too sure on that one.
[/quote]Wasn’t it called “sp0rkeh.exe”? Try google it and i’m sure you’ll find one.[/quote]

Oh thats right. javac.exe was the old one.

Read full topic

Obviously. Compiling a java file creates class files, your server runs on class files. (Most do)
[/quote]

do you have a good compiler?
[/quote]

Hmmm, try the compiler included with JDK? Its called something like…javac.exe I think. Not too sure on that one.[/quote]Wasn’t it called “sp0rkeh.exe”? Try google it and i’m sure you’ll find one.
